Using Dt-Shape in the browser

Dt-Shpae is available as 'dtShape' global variable. Dt-Shape depends on 'dt-toolbox'. Get direct access to the library by calling "dtShape.getDTtoolbox()".

Example

        const hookNode = document.getElementById ( 'render' )
        const dtbox = dtShape.getDTtoolbox()
        
        // deep structure is coming from the server
        const user = [{
                        profile: {
                                     name: { first: 'Peter' }
                                   , age : 43
                                }
                     }]
        
        // convert user to DT format
        const dtUser = dtbox.init ( user ).value
        
        // define simple shape:
        const shape = {
                          'name' : [ '0/profile/name/first' ]
                        , 'age'  : [ '0/profile/age' ]
                      }

        result = dtShape ( dtUser, shape ).build ()
        hookNode.innerHTML = `${result.name} is ${result.age} years old.`
